statements: SELECT * FROM incident_response WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_description FROM incident_response WHERE affected_systems > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_type FROM incident_response WHERE regulatory_guidelines IS NOT NULL;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, response_plan FROM incident_response WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM incident_response WHERE incident_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY affected_systems DESC, incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incident_response ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) as num_incidents FROM incident_response GROUP BY incident_type;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM incident_response WHERE affected_systems > 10;
SELECT * FROM incident_response WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND regulatory_guidelines IS NOT NULL;
SELECT incident_id, response_plan FROM incident_response WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Incidents;
SELECT incident_type, severity_level, description FROM Incidents;
SELECT reported_by, reported_at FROM Incidents ORDER BY reported_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM IncidentResponses WHERE response_type = 'Acknowledgement';
SELECT incident_type, response_details FROM Incidents JOIN IncidentResponses ON Incidents.incident_id = IncidentResponses.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM Incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity_level, description FROM Incidents WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY reported_at DESC;
SELECT response_id, incident_id, response_timestamp, response_type FROM IncidentResponses WHERE response_type = 'Handled' ORDER BY response_timestamp ASC;
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM Incidents GROUP BY reported_by HAVING total_reports > 2;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT incident_type, severity FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT description FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Fire';
SELECT * FROM incident_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, log_message FROM incident_logs WHERE incident_id = 2;
SELECT id, description FROM incidents WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT * FROM incident_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_type='Fire' AND severity > 2;
SELECT * FROM incident_logs LEFT JOIN incidents ON incident_logs.incident_id = incidents.id;
SELECT guideline_text FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY guideline_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, incident_type, severity FROM incidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT description FROM incidents ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_responses WHERE responder_id = 1;
SELECT guideline_name, description FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_type, severity, date_reported FROM incidents WHERE severity='High';

SELECT incidents.id, responders.name, incidents.incident_type, incidents.severity, incident_responses.response_time FROM incidents JOIN incident_responses ON incidents.id = incident_responses.incident_id JOIN responders ON incident_responses.responder_id = responders.id;

SELECT incidents.id, incidents.description, responders.name AS responder_name, responders.role AS responder_role, incident_responses.response_time FROM incidents JOIN incident_responses ON incidents.id = incident_responses.incident_id JOIN responders ON incident_responses.responder_id = responders.id WHERE responders.role='Team Lead';
SELECT response_time, resolution, guideline_name, regulatory_guidelines.description FROM incident_responses JOIN regulatory_guidelines ON incident_responses.id = regulatory_guidelines.id;
SELECT * FROM IncidentDetail;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE affected_systems > 10;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead FROM IncidentResponseTeam ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT log_description FROM IncidentLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT guideline_id, guideline_name, guideline_link FROM RegulatoryGuidelines WHERE guideline_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, affected_systems FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE affected_systems > 10;
SELECT i.incident_date, d.detail_description, r.team_name FROM SecurityIncidents i JOIN IncidentDetail d ON i.incident_id = d.incident_id JOIN IncidentResponseTeam r ON r.team_name = i.response_team;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryGuidelines WHERE guideline_link LIKE '%https%';
